names.pinyin: wu she qu feng tang jia jian
names.commonEnglish: Modified Black-Tail Snake Decoction for Expelling Wind

actions: Strongly unblocks the channels and extinguishes Wind Dispels Wind from the skin.
Releases the exterior, expels Wind, vents rashes and relieves itching.
With Chi Xiao Dou, clears heat, promotes the flow of Blood, reduces rashes and alleviates itching for itchy Wind-Rash and swollen, toxic sores.
With Fang Feng,. Jin Yin Hua and Lian Qiao, for early-stage carbuncles, furuncles, and abscesses.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, drains Fire, detoxifies and cools the Blood.
Releases the exterior, disperses Cold and guides Qi to the Tai Yang and Du channels.
With Jing Jie and Fang Feng, for occipital headache from Wind-Cold without perspiration.
Releases the exterior and expels External Wind.
With Jing Jie, for pruritic rash.
With Jing Jie and Chan Tui, for dermatological disorders with rash, irritability and itching.
Clears Heat (especially in the Upper Jiao), relieves toxicity and clears Blood Heat.
With Jin Yin Hua, for initial stage Wind-Heat.
Clears Heat, resolves Fire toxicity and vents and disperses External Wind-Heat.
With Lian Qiao, for various Heat disorders.
With HUang Qin, for suppurating boils that have not ulcerated, or have ulcerated but are not discharging pus.
Disperses Wind, clears Heat, vents rashes and relieves itching.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
With Jin Yin Hua, for damp rashes or acne.
Clears Heat, dries Dampness, disperses Wind and stops itching.
With Chan Tui and Jing Jie, for generalized itching.
Removes Wind and Dampness, invigorates the Blood resolves toxins and stops itching.
Clears Damp Heat, disperses Blood Stasis, reduces swelling and reduces Fire toxicity.
Arrests Wind
Transforms Dampness
Clears Heat
Alleviates itching

symptoms: this chronic pattern responds poorly to treatment
The lesions manifest as thickened, infiltrative, lichenified plaques resembling the skin on the neck of an ox

modifications.purpose: tension, irritability or sudden outbursts of anger
thickened skin with deep crease lines
